room_title: Escape room "Christmas Cookie Caper" by Escape Hour Room in Chicago
room_address: 619 E Boughton Road Suite 140 Bolingbrook, IL 60440
room_description:
Mom and Dad went out to do last minute shopping. Grandma and Grandpa came over to babysit. Now, the Christmas cookies are missing. We needed them to set out for Santa and his reindeer! Who did it? 
We need your help to solve the mystery of “Who Ate the Cookies?”. As junior detectives, you will need to piece together clues to solve the Christmas Cookie Caper. Find the recipe, gather the ingredients, bake a new batch of cookies, and put them out for Santa and his reindeer in time for Santa’s visit. You only have 30 minutes. Otherwise, Santa will have to skip your house this year!
